'''Arkaras''' was a very tall bearded man who maintained a fierce expression in the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was a shipwright who operated out of the eastern side of the harbor at [[Scornubel]], and he maintained the ships that operated in the area, including owning the ferry that crossed from Scornubel to the south bank of the [[River Chionthar]].
